nodes.bodyText: @lisakowen I've added these types: date, time, timestamp, and timestamp with time zone. Is there any other Greenplum type you think I should certify?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -53,15 +54,23 @@
             "type_enum_mood mood",
             "type_long_array BIGINT[]",
             "type_numeric_array NUMERIC(8,1)[]",
-            "type_string_array TEXT[]"
+            "type_string_array TEXT[]",
+            "type_date DATE",
+            "type_time TIME",
+            "type_timestamp TIMESTAMP",
+            "type_timestampz TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE"

nodes.bodyText: the only other one that i can think of right now is varchar.  but not sure how often one would use that type when writing to avro?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -53,15 +54,23 @@
             "type_enum_mood mood",
             "type_long_array BIGINT[]",
             "type_numeric_array NUMERIC(8,1)[]",

nodes.bodyText:
Added testing for char and varchar. (in the tests for primitive types).
We use a writable external table with char and varchar columns that write to Avro string types, and can read them back into a readable external table using the same types.
